meanings.definition: A type of Chinese noodle dish typically made with vegetables, meat, and a savory sauce.
meanings.sent1: I ordered lomeins for dinner at the Chinese restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared delicious lomeins for the customers.
meanings.sent3: The lomeins danced in the wok as the chef cooked them.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the lomeins filled the kitchen, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent5: The colorful lomeins looked like a work of art on the plate.

meanings.definition: To prepare or cook a dish of Chinese noodles with vegetables, meat, and a savory sauce.
meanings.sent1: She lomeins the noodles with precision and care.
meanings.sent2: We lomeins the ingredients together in the wok.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally lomeinsed the noodles too long, making them soggy.
meanings.sent4: The chef lomeinsed the dish to perfection, pleasing all the customers.
meanings.sent5: Lomeinsing the noodles requires skill and practice to get it right.
